bug.summary: Couldn't connect to trainer on port 5004 using API version 1.0.0. Will perform inference instead.
bug.description:
Describe the bug when I play 3Dball or RollerBall example, has error -> Couldn't connect to trainer on port 5004 using API version 1.0.0. Will perform inference instead. To Reproduce
mlagents-learn config/trainer_config.yaml --run-id=exampleID click play button
Console logs / stack traces Couldn't connect to trainer on port 5004 using API version 1.0.0. Will perform inference instead. UnityEngine.Debug:Log(Object) Unity.MLAgents.Academy:InitializeEnvironment() (at Screenshots Environment (please complete the following information):
Unity Version: Unity 2019.3.14.f1 OS + version: Mac 10.15.4 ML-Agents version: ml-agents-release_2 TensorFlow version: 2.2.0 Environment: Anaconda virtual environment, installed all necessary package -python version: 3.7.7
NOTE: I tried runing the mlagents-learn script, then clicked play button but it did not work. I ran the mlagents-learn script at correct directory.
